Player History

Traded from Brooklyn to Detroit on 3/2/2023 (Going to BRO: 2B Xavier Lamere. Going to DET: C Clyde Roberts)...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 7/30/2023 (Going to DET: 1B Jason Domingo, P Shannon Fulton. Going to CIN: C Clyde Roberts, P Thurman Brawley)...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 2/21/2025 (Going to STL: C Clyde Roberts. Going to CIN: CF Yonehiko Kafu)...
Injured on 6/21/2025 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
